value:
The wind here...and this land...
I find it all so refreshing.

I sense that you are somehow...
different than everyone else
around us.

Thank you for your kindness.
I don't take it for granted,
$Nu.

I know many dances—those for
any occasion and a few for
special ones. Care to see some?

I am able to sense impending
danger. But at the moment, I sense...
nothing that puts us in peril.

I bear greetings as well as a
dance of friendship on behalf
of $Nf.

Does this please you? Then
I am satisfied.

I sense that...I can do still
better than this.

Sorry. I will never be able to
help at this rate.

I sense that this has helped awaken
my potential.

I am Ninian—quite simply, a traveling
performer, glad to put on a show.
It's nothing much, really.

So you surely realize by now
that...dragon blood courses
through my veins.$k$pDragons have not often lived in
harmony with humans...or is
it vice versa?$k$pYet here I feel as if I can truly be
myself without fear or shame.
That's because of you.$k$pYou have the rare gift of seeing
others, or at least me, as if there
are no divisions between us.$k$pI appreciate this more than you
can know. And so, I offer you all
my dances in deep gratitude.
えい！
はぁっ！
きゃああっ！
No...
Behold my power!
No more—!
May this make a difference!
I will try!
Ahhh...
Heehee...
May the dance move you.
I'd like to help.
What do you need of me?
You and I are...? Friends.
I hope you're not afraid of dragons.
Humans and dragons... Will they ever live in harmony?
You accept me as I am, don't you?
Yes?
Hmm?
Of course.
